TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BulletedListEventHandler(object sender, BulletedListEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BulletedListEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub BulletedListEventHandler(sender As Object, e As BulletedListEventArgs)
public delegate void BulletedListEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, BulletedListEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 类型的参数。

span.span: The argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建委托时，需要标识将处理的方法事件控件。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event of a control. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 单击列表项时，在显示一条消息页上的控件。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]
